subclassFeature.name: Expanded Spell List
entries: The Shadow Stalker lets you choose from an expanded spell list of spells when you learn a warlock spell. The following spells are added to the warlock spell list for you.

subclassFeature.name: Dark Fears
entries: Starting at 1st level, you gain a sinister, shadow like aura. You may make intimidation rolls as a free action, the creature must make a wisdom check against your Spell DC or be frightened for a minute.
This may not be affected by spells such as bless. They have disadvantage if you are in dim light or darkness.

subclassFeature.name: Shadow Summon
entries: Starting at 6th level you manipulate the space in ones shadows. Once per short rest, you may target a dead creature of equal or lower CR/Level and summon a shadow of it, this shadow obeys you while it is summoned and is banished after a minute.
You may spend an hour attuning to a creatures shadow by preforming a ritual on its corpse. For the next day you may summon that creature again without it's body's presence.
If you preform this ritual for 30 days consecutivley you can permenantly summon the shadow.

subclassFeature.name: Nights Respite
entries: When you are in darkness of any kind, a 10ft radius around you is treated as magical darkness. You and your allies can see in this darkness.
Once per short rest you may produce this 10 ft of magical darkeness at will.

subclassFeature.name: Nightmareish Repose
entries: At 14th level, you gain the ability to manipulate the living or dead through the shadows. You may touch an unconsious, incapacitated, or dead creature, it becomes your Puppet.
The Puppet remains in the state it was in and does everything you tell it to, be it speak, take an action, or cast a spell as normal.
Only a remove curse, or wish spell can remove this effect and you may only have one Puppet at a time.
